welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.transcribed: Welcome to soundybytes, record jokes, melodies, beats, notes and more.

melody.name: Melody
melody.description: Have you ever thought of a melody but forgot it before you can record it? SoundBytes is a portable, simple, and fast way to save on-the-fly muscial ideas!

joke.name: Joke
joke.description: Traditional notes apps don't preserve important features of jokes such as timing, pitch, and cadence. Record a soundbyte to level up your comedy skills!
joke.transcribed: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
